Class AcceptTradeOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOverlayView, IView, IAcceptTradeOverlay, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class AcceptTradeOverlay
extends OverlayView
implements IAcceptTradeOverlay
    Implementation of the "accept trade" overlay, which is used to let the user accept or reject a trade
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
